children.name: Windows JSON - PCI Req 02, 08, 10 - Account, User, System Monitoring
children.title: Windows JSON - PCI Req 02, 08, 10 - Account, User, System Monitoring

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=Security 4720
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| fields dest_host, dest_user, dest_domain, src_user, src_domain, EventID, msg_summary
| timeslice 1s
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, dest_host, dest_user, dest_domain, src_user, src_domain, EventID, msg_summary
| where EventID="4720"
| sort by _timeslice

_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=Security 4726
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| fields dest_host, dest_user, dest_domain, src_user, src_domain, EventID, msg_summary
| timeslice 1s
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, dest_host, dest_user, dest_domain, src_user, src_domain, EventID, msg_summary
| where EventID="4726"
| sort by _timeslice

_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=Security 4725
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID="4725"
| fields dest_host, dest_user, dest_domain, src_user, src_domain, EventID, msg_summary
| fields -_raw
| timeslice 1s
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, dest_host, dest_user, dest_domain, src_user, src_domain, EventID, msg_summary
| sort by _timeslice

_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=Security 4722
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID="4722"
| fields dest_host, dest_user, dest_domain, src_user, src_domain, EventID, msg_summary
| fields -_raw
| timeslice 1s
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, dest_host, dest_user, dest_domain, src_user, src_domain, EventID, msg_summary
| sort by _timeslice

_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=Security
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.UserWorkstations" as src_host nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| src_user as %"Source User" | dest_user as %"Target User" | dest_host as %"Target Host" 
| format("%S",src_user) as %"Source User" | format("%S",dest_user) as %"Target User"
| fields EventID, msg_summary, src_host, %"Source User", %"Target Host", %"Target User"
| where (%"Source User" in ("ROOT","ADMIN","ADMINISTRATOR")) or (%"Target User" in ("ROOT","ADMIN","ADMINISTRATOR")) 
| count as %"Count" by EventID, %"Source User", %"Target Host", %"Target User" | sort by Count

_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=Security (4740 or 644)
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| fields dest_host, dest_user, src_user, src_domain, EventID, msg_summary
| fields -_raw
| timeslice 1s
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, dest_host, dest_user, src_user, src_domain, EventID, msg_summary
| where EventID in ("4740", "644")
| sort by _timeslice

_sourceCategory=windows/events  (_sourceName=Security or _sourceName=System) (1102 or 517 or 104)
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "UserData.LogFileCleared.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "UserData.LogFileCleared.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| fields dest_host, src_user, src_domain, EventID, msg_summary
| fields -_raw
| where EventID in ("1102", "517", "104")
| timeslice 1s
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, dest_host, src_user, src_domain, EventID, msg_summary
| sort by _timeslice

_sourceCategory=windows/events ((_sourceName=Security 4616) or (_sourceName=System (35 or 37) ))
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID in ("4616", "35", "37") 
| if (msg_summary="The system time was changed" and src_user <> "LOCAL SERVICE" and src_domain <> "NT AUTHORITY", "Critical", "Low") as Severity
| fields dest_host, src_user, src_domain, Severity, EventID, msg_summary
| fields -_raw
| timeslice 1s
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, dest_host, src_user, src_domain, Severity, EventID, msg_summary
| sort by Severity asc, _timeslice

_sourceCategory=windows/events (_sourceName=Security or _sourceName=System) ("Audit Policy Change" or "System audit policy was changed" or *policy*change*)
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "Keywords" as msg_type nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID in ("4902", "4904", "4905", "4906", "4907", "4912", "4715", "4717", "4719" ) or msg_summary="System audit policy was changed" or msg_summary matches "*policy*change*" or msg_summary matches "*Policy*Change*"
| if (msg_type matches "*Success","Change/Configuration/Policy/Success", if (msg_type matches "*Fail*", "Change/Configuration/Policy/Failure", "Change/Configuration/Policy/Attempt")) as classification
| fields dest_host, src_user, src_domain, classification, EventID, msg_summary
| timeslice 1s
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, dest_host, src_user, src_domain, classification, EventID, msg_summary
| sort by _timeslice

_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=System 7036 "stopped state"
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| parse regex field=msg_summary "The (?<service>\w.+?) service entered the (?<state>\w+) state" nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID="7036"
| count as eventCount, first(_messagetime) as latest, last(_messagetime) as earliest by service, dest_host, state | latest as _timeslice
| fields _timeslice, dest_host, service, state, latest, earliest, eventCount
| where state="stopped"
| formatDate(fromMillis(latest),"yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss Z") as %"LatestTime" 
| formatDate(fromMillis(earliest),"yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss Z") as %"EarliestTime" 
| fields -latest, earliest
| sort by _timeslice

_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=System 7036
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| parse regex field=msg_summary "The (?<service>\w.+?) service entered the (?<state>\w+) state" nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID="7036"
| fields EventID, dest_host, msg_summary, service, state
| timeslice 1h 
| count by _timeslice, service
| transpose row _timeslice column service

_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=Security 4608
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| fields dest_host, msg_summary, EventID
| timeslice 1s
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, dest_host, msg_summary, EventID
| where EventID="4608"
| sort by _timeslice

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=Security 4624
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.IpPort" as src_port nodrop
| json "EventData.IpAddress" as src_ip nodrop
| json "EventData.LogonType" as logon_type nodrop
| json "EventData.WorkstationName" as src_host nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID="4624" 
| fields dest_host, dest_user, dest_domain, src_host, src_ip, src_user, src_domain, src_port, logon_type, EventID, msg_summary
| fields -_raw
| count as eventCount

_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=Security 4624
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.IpPort" as src_port nodrop
| json "EventData.IpAddress" as src_ip nodrop
| json "EventData.LogonType" as logon_type nodrop
| json "EventData.WorkstationName" as src_host nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID="4624" 
| fields dest_host, dest_user, dest_domain, src_host, src_ip, src_user, src_domain, src_port, logon_type, EventID, msg_summary
| fields -_raw
| timeslice 1s
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, dest_host, dest_user, dest_domain, src_host, src_ip, src_user, src_domain, src_port, logon_type, msg_summary, EventID
| sort by _timeslice

_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=Security (4625 or 4768 or 4771 or 4776)
| parse regex "Failure Information:\s+Failure Reason:\s+(?<fail_reason>[^.\r]+?)[.\r]" nodrop 
| parse regex "Logfile = \"Security\";[\s\S]+?Client Address:\s+(?<src_ip>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Client Port:\s+?(?<src_port>[\d-]+)" nodrop 
| parse regex "Logfile = \"Security\";[\s\S]+?Source Network Address:\s+(?<src_ip>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Source Port:\s+?(?<src_port>[\d-]+)" nodrop 
| parse regex "Logfile = \"Security\";[\s\S]+?Account Name:\s+(?<src_user>[^\r]+?)\r" nodrop | parse regex "Logfile = \"Security\";[\s\S]+?Subject[\s\S]+?Account Name:\s+(?<src_user>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Account Domain:\s+(?<src_domain>[^\r\"]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Account Name:\s+(?<dest_user>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Account Domain:\s+(?<dest_domain>[^\r\"]+?)\r" nodrop 
| parse regex "Result Code:\s+(?<result_code>[^\r]+)\r" nodrop 
| parse "Type = \"*\";" as type nodrop
| parse regex "Logon Account:\s+(?<src_user>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Source Workstation:\s+(?<src_host>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Error Code:\s+(?<error_code>[^\r\"]+?)(?:\r|\";)" nodrop | parse regex "Failure Code:\s+(?<failure_code>[^\r]+)\r" nodrop | parse regex "Logfile = \"Security\";[\s\S]+?Workstation Name:\s+(?<src_host>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Source Network Address:\s+(?<src_ip>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Source Port:\s+?(?<src_port>[\d-]+)" nodrop
| json "EventID" nodrop
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.IpPort" as src_port nodrop
| json "EventData.IpAddress" as src_ip nodrop
| json "EventData.LogonType" as logon_type nodrop
| json "EventData.WorkstationName" as src_host nodrop
| json "EventData.FailureReason" as failure_reason
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID in ("4625", "4771") or (EventID="4768" and result_code !="0x0") or (EventID="4776" and error_code !="0x0")
| fields dest_host, dest_user, dest_domain, src_host, src_ip, src_port, src_user, src_domain, logon_type, type, fail_reason, result_code, failure_code, error_code, EventID, msg_summary
| fields -_raw
| if (dest_domain="Failure Information:", "", dest_domain) as dest_domain
| if (isEmpty(src_host), src_ip, src_host) as src_host
| count as eventCount

_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=Security (4625 or 4768 or 4771 or 4776)
| parse regex "Failure Information:\s+Failure Reason:\s+(?<fail_reason>[^.\r]+?)[.\r]" nodrop 
| parse regex "Logfile = \"Security\";[\s\S]+?Client Address:\s+(?<src_ip>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Client Port:\s+?(?<src_port>[\d-]+)" nodrop 
| parse regex "Logfile = \"Security\";[\s\S]+?Source Network Address:\s+(?<src_ip>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Source Port:\s+?(?<src_port>[\d-]+)" nodrop 
| parse regex "Logfile = \"Security\";[\s\S]+?Account Name:\s+(?<src_user>[^\r]+?)\r" nodrop | parse regex "Logfile = \"Security\";[\s\S]+?Subject[\s\S]+?Account Name:\s+(?<src_user>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Account Domain:\s+(?<src_domain>[^\r\"]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Account Name:\s+(?<dest_user>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Account Domain:\s+(?<dest_domain>[^\r\"]+?)\r" nodrop 
| parse regex "Result Code:\s+(?<result_code>[^\r]+)\r" nodrop 
| parse "Type = \"*\";" as type nodrop
| parse regex "Logon Account:\s+(?<src_user>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Source Workstation:\s+(?<src_host>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Error Code:\s+(?<error_code>[^\r\"]+?)(?:\r|\";)" nodrop | parse regex "Failure Code:\s+(?<failure_code>[^\r]+)\r" nodrop | parse regex "Logfile = \"Security\";[\s\S]+?Workstation Name:\s+(?<src_host>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Source Network Address:\s+(?<src_ip>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Source Port:\s+?(?<src_port>[\d-]+)" nodrop
| json "EventID" nodrop
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.IpPort" as src_port nodrop
| json "EventData.IpAddress" as src_ip nodrop
| json "EventData.LogonType" as logon_type nodrop
| json "EventData.WorkstationName" as src_host nodrop
| json "EventData.FailureReason" as failure_reason
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID in ("4625", "4771") or (EventID="4768" and result_code !="0x0") or (EventID="4776" and error_code !="0x0")
| fields dest_host, dest_user, dest_domain, src_host, src_ip, src_port, src_user, src_domain, logon_type, type, fail_reason, result_code, failure_code, error_code, EventID, msg_summary
| fields -_raw
| if (dest_domain="Failure Information:", "", dest_domain) as dest_domain
| if (isEmpty(src_host), src_ip, src_host) as src_host
| timeslice 1s
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, dest_host, dest_user, dest_domain, src_host, src_ip, src_user, src_domain, src_port, logon_type, fail_reason, msg_summary, EventID, result_code, failure_code, error_code
| sort by _timeslice

children.name: Windows JSON - PCI Req 06 - Windows Updates Activity
children.title: Windows JSON - PCI Req 06 - Windows Updates Activity

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=System (19 or 20)
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| parse field=msg_summary "Installation Successful: Windows successfully installed the following update: *" as Update nodrop
| parse field=msg_summary "Installation Failure: Windows failed to install the following update with error *: *" as errorCode, Update nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID in ("19", "20")
| if(msg_summary matches "Installation Failure*", "Update/Failure", if (msg_summary matches "Installation Successful*", "Update/Success", "Update/Attempt")) as %"Installation Status"
| fields -_raw 
| Computer as %"Destination Host"
| parse field=Update "(*)" as kbnum nodrop 
| timeslice 1s
| count by _timeslice, %"Destination Host", update, %"Installation Status", errorCode, src_user, src_domain, EventID, kbnum

_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=System (19 or 20)
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| parse field=msg_summary "Installation Successful: Windows successfully installed the following update: *" as Update nodrop
| parse field=msg_summary "Installation Failure: Windows failed to install the following update with error *: *" as errorCode, Update nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID in ("19", "20")
| if(msg_summary matches "Installation Failure*", "Update/Failure", if (msg_summary matches "Installation Successful*", "Update/Success", "Update/Attempt")) as %"Installation Status"
| fields -_raw
| Computer as %"Destination Host"
| timeslice 1s
| withtime %"Installation Status" 
| most_recent(%"Installation Status_withtime") as %"LastStatus" by %"Destination Host", update, _timeslice
| parse field=Update "(*)" as kbnum nodrop
| where %"LastStatus"="Update/Failure"

_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=System (19 or 20)
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| parse field=msg_summary "Installation Successful: Windows successfully installed the following update: *" as Update nodrop
| parse field=msg_summary "Installation Failure: Windows failed to install the following update with error *: *" as errorCode, Update nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID in ("19", "20")
| if(msg_summary matches "Installation Failure*", "Update/Failure", if (msg_summary matches "Installation Successful*", "Update/Success", "Update/Attempt")) as %"Installation Status"
| fields -_raw
| Computer as %"Destination Host"
| timeslice 1s
| withtime %"Installation Status" 
| most_recent(%"Installation Status_withtime") as %"LastStatus" by %"Destination Host", update, _timeslice
| parse field=Update "(*)" as kbnum nodrop
| count_distinct(%"Destination Host") by LastStatus, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column LastStatus

_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=System (19 or 20)
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| parse field=msg_summary "Installation Successful: Windows successfully installed the following update: *" as Update nodrop
| parse field=msg_summary "Installation Failure: Windows failed to install the following update with error *: *" as errorCode, Update nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID in ("19", "20")
| if(msg_summary matches "Installation Failure*", "Update/Failure", if (msg_summary matches "Installation Successful*", "Update/Success", "Update/Attempt")) as %"Installation Status"
| fields -_raw
| Computer as %"Destination Host"
| timeslice 1s
| withtime %"Installation Status" 
| most_recent(%"Installation Status_withtime") as %"LastStatus" by %"Destination Host", update, _timeslice
| parse field=Update "(*)" as kbnum nodrop
| count by %"Destination Host", %"LastStatus"
| transpose row %"Destination Host" column %"LastStatus"

_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=System (19 or 20)
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| parse field=msg_summary "Installation Successful: Windows successfully installed the following update: *" as Update nodrop
| parse field=msg_summary "Installation Failure: Windows failed to install the following update with error *: *" as errorCode, Update nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID in ("19", "20")
| if(msg_summary matches "Installation Failure*", "Update/Failure", if (msg_summary matches "Installation Successful*", "Update/Success", "Update/Attempt")) as %"Installation Status"
| fields -_raw
| Computer as %"Destination Host"
| timeslice 1s
| withtime %"Installation Status" 
| most_recent(%"Installation Status_withtime") as %"LastStatus" by %"Destination Host", update, _timeslice
| parse field=Update "(*)" as kbnum nodrop
| count_distinct(%"Destination Host") as %"Hosts" by LastStatus, update
| transpose row update column LastStatus

| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop

_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=Security (4625 or 4768 or 4771 or 4776)
| parse regex "Failure Information:\s+Failure Reason:\s+(?<fail_reason>[^.\r]+?)[.\r]" nodrop 
| parse regex "Logfile = \"Security\";[\s\S]+?Client Address:\s+(?<src_ip>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Client Port:\s+?(?<src_port>[\d-]+)" nodrop 
| parse regex "Logfile = \"Security\";[\s\S]+?Source Network Address:\s+(?<src_ip>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Source Port:\s+?(?<src_port>[\d-]+)" nodrop 
| parse regex "Logfile = \"Security\";[\s\S]+?Account Name:\s+(?<src_user>[^\r]+?)\r" nodrop | parse regex "Logfile = \"Security\";[\s\S]+?Subject[\s\S]+?Account Name:\s+(?<src_user>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Account Domain:\s+(?<src_domain>[^\r\"]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Account Name:\s+(?<dest_user>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Account Domain:\s+(?<dest_domain>[^\r\"]+?)\r" nodrop 
| parse regex "Result Code:\s+(?<result_code>[^\r]+)\r" nodrop 
| parse "Type = \"*\";" as type nodrop
| parse regex "Logon Account:\s+(?<src_user>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Source Workstation:\s+(?<src_host>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Error Code:\s+(?<error_code>[^\r\"]+?)(?:\r|\";)" nodrop | parse regex "Failure Code:\s+(?<failure_code>[^\r]+)\r" nodrop | parse regex "Logfile = \"Security\";[\s\S]+?Workstation Name:\s+(?<src_host>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Source Network Address:\s+(?<src_ip>[^\r]+?)\r[\s\S]+?Source Port:\s+?(?<src_port>[\d-]+)" nodrop
| json "EventID" nodrop
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.IpPort" as src_port nodrop
| json "EventData.IpAddress" as src_ip nodrop
| json "EventData.LogonType" as logon_type nodrop
| json "EventData.WorkstationName" as src_host nodrop
| json "EventData.FailureReason" as failure_reason
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID in ("4625", "4771") or (EventID="4768" and result_code !="0x0") or (EventID="4776" and error_code !="0x0")
| if (dest_domain="Failure Information:", "", dest_domain) as dest_domain
| if (isEmpty(src_host), src_ip, src_host) as src_host
| src_user as %"Source User" | dest_host as %"Target Host" | dest_user as %"Target User" | src_host as %"Source Host" 
| timeslice 5m
| count as %"Attempts" by _timeslice, %"Source Host", %"Source User", src_domain, %"Target Host", %"Target User", dest_domain
| format("Excessive (%d) login failures observed", %"Attempts") as message
| 3 as threshold
| where %"Attempts" > threshold
| sort by _timeslice, %"Attempts"
| fields -threshold, %"Attempts"

_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=Security 4767
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID="4767"
| timeslice 1s
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, dest_host, src_user, src_domain, dest_user, dest_domain, msg_summary, EventID
| sort by _timeslice

panels.title: User Account Disabled, Not Deleted Over 1 Day

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=windows/events _sourceName=Security (4726 or 4725)
| json "EventID"
| json "Computer" nodrop
| json "Message" as msg_summary nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectUserName" as src_user nodrop
| json "EventData.SubjectDomainName" as src_domain nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetUserName" as dest_user nodrop
| json "EventData.TargetDomainName" as dest_domain nodrop
| Computer as dest_host
| where EventID in ("4725","4726")
| withtime msg_summary | withtime _messagetime
| most_recent(msg_summary_withtime) as action, most_recent(_messagetime_withtime) as m_time by dest_host, dest_user
| formatDate(fromMillis(m_time), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss:SSS z") as event_time
| 1000*60*60*24 as Oneday
| 1 as threshold 
| num(threshold) as threshold
| ((toMillis(now())-m_time)/oneday) as since_days | format("%.2f", since_days) as since_days_str
| concat ("User account was disabled ", since_days_str, " days ago, but not yet deleted.") as Remark
| where !(action matches "*user account was deleted*")
| where since_days >= threshold
| sort by since_days
| fields - m_time, Oneday, since_days_str, action, since_days, threshold
